      • searchByUsername

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> searchByUsername(java.lang.String username)
        Searches a User or Admin by using username. If username correspond to a User, include all trading information about this User.
        Parameters:
        username - possible username of a User.
        Returns:
        Map of short descriptions to long descriptions of the result entries.

      • setMeetingThreshold

        public void setMeetingThreshold(MeetingThresholdType type,
                                int newLimit)
        Set the given threshold type to the threshold newLimit
        Parameters:
        type - the type indicating which of the two threshold it is, maxMeetingEdits or maxMeetingLateTime
        newLimit - the value of the threshold type to be set to

      • getMeetingThreshold

        public int getMeetingThreshold(MeetingThresholdType type)
        Parameters:
        type - the type indicating which of the two threshold it is, maxMeetingEdits or maxMeetingLateTime
        Returns:
        the maximum num of times a user can edit a meeting or the maximum time given to a user to confirm a meeting after the time the meeting should have occurred.

      • setTradeThreshold

        public void setTradeThreshold(TradeThresholdType type,
                              int val)
        Sets the trade related threshold of type to value.

        Precondition: type must be either MAX_INCOMPLETE_TRADES, MAX_WEEKLY_TRANSACTIONS or MIN_LEND_BORROW_DIFF.

        Parameters:
        type - the type of threshold to be set.
        val - the new value of type to be set.

      • getTradeThreshold

        public int getTradeThreshold(TradeThresholdType type)
        Gets the trade related threshold of type.

        Precondition: type must be either MAX_INCOMPLETE_TRADES, MAX_WEEKLY_TRANSACTIONS or MIN_LEND_BORROW_DIFF.

        Parameters:
        type - the type of threshold to be shown.
        Returns:
        the value of the threshold type.

      • getUserViolateLimit

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getUserViolateLimit(java.lang.String type)
        Return a map contains different usernames desired as keys based on input. Values are all the same int to indicating the type of keys
        Parameters:
        type - a String indicating the desired usernames type
        Returns:
        a map that keys are satisfied users' username, values are int to indicate what type of users have been found
